Question
========

A researcher administers a depression questionnaire to 50 well-sporting and 50 non-sporting adolescents and wants to test the difference in means using a t-test. The test is standardized to have a mean of 50. She finds means of 54.6 and 52.3, respectively, and a pooled variance of 49. What is the associated effect size? 
Answerlist
----------
* D = 0.33
* D = 0.49
* D = 0.05
* D = 0.12

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
